attributes.action: Ensure all health workers have free parking 24/7 at their places of work
attributes.additional_details: Health workers are putting their own lives at risk to ensure we all stay safe. They need to be able to arrive at their places of work without the worry of how much parking their car will cost especially when working extremely long hours. This is a small price to pay to ensure one less worry for these important individuals.
attributes.background: To ensure all health workers are entitled 24/7 to free parking at their places of work. This is particularly important during the Covid-19 crisis.

rejection.details:
The Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You might also like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
